response.message: I've had good experiences with the various CHAOS members that I've "run into" around stackexchange. Nice work guys!
Aren't these folks awfully good-looking to be working at a tech company?  (No offense meant, of course, to all of the attractive developers.)
Welcome aboard! I'll be following the doings of CHAOS with enthusiasm and fascination.
Brett looks familiar because he looks like one half of Flight of the Conchords (no wonder he was hired to add humour).
Valued associate #44 totally looks like the arsonist girl http://i.crackedcdn.com/phpimages/article/5/6/0/85560_v1.jpg
I think I've seen Katey in UCB!  And she probably knows my cousin.  CHAOS is everywhere!  Time to find foil  for my hat.
Is there any particular reason for not linking to their SE profiles in this post?
What happended to Valued Associates #42, #43 and #45??
At the risk of being labelled a geek (wouldn't want that now, would I?), Harry Potter was not, in fact, a prefect.

Hey @SteveJ, who is your cousin? I am around UCB a fair amount, nicely spotted.

And @Midhat... fires? What fires? That wasn't a house fire, that was a... bonfire... yeah, that's the ticket.
Hey!  I fixed that wall!  Maybe not your head?

Hey @KateyCHAOS, that would be J Flowers :  http://www.ucbcomedy.com/talent/view/1979/jason-flowers.  

This has happened before - J is apparently the Kevin Bacon of my internet haunts.
